title: 90 Day Fiance stars Loren and Alexei Brovarnik announce they are expecting their first child in May
text:
90 Day Fiance stars Loren and Alexei Brovarnik are expecting their first baby.

Sharing the news on social media, the 31-year-old posted a series of photos with her man holding and kissing her stomach.

'We're so excited to finally say, BabyBrov is on its way!' she began, revealing the baby is due in May.

Scroll down for video

Baby on the way! 90 Day Fiance stars Loren and Alexei Brovarnik announced they were pregnant with their first child on Tuesday on social media

'For those of you saying I'm pregnant, well, ding ding ding, we cannot wait to welcome our baby boy or girl this Spring!'

Alex also celebrated the news over on his page, gushing over how excited he was to be a father after the Spring arrival.

'Yes it's tru we are pregnant couldn't be more excited, I AM GOING TO BE A DADDY!!'

Spring baby: 'For those of you saying I'm pregnant, well, ding ding ding, we cannot wait to welcome our baby boy or girl this Spring!'

Growing belly: Loren stunned in a form-fitting dress that drew attention to her burgeoning baby bump

Loren stunned in a form-fitting dress that drew attention to her burgeoning baby bump.

The couple even shared a sonogram of their little one next to a pair of tiny Adidas sneakers.

The reality star beauty also told her followers on social media that the pregnancy was not planned and took place when they were abroad in Israel.

'We actually got very lucky and it happened right away, when we weren't really trying but just for fun. It happened in Israel.'

Loren also shared some more raw shots of herself suffering through morning sickness.

Big, medium and little: The couple even shared a sonogram of their little one next to a pair of tiny Adidas sneakers

'Morning sickness! It's been morning, day and night sickness for me. And I'm FINALLY feeling better during the day but I still have the morning sickness. YES this is what I looked like a few weeks ago! #sohot,' she shared.

Loren also spoke to People where she confessed she was 'terrified' but 'excited.'

'I see a lot of people I know (personally) announcing their own exciting news, and now it's my turn!' says Loren. 'I'm excited, terrified, over the moon, nervous and so much more!'

'Alex is hands down the best partner I could have ever asked for during this time,' she added.

Meant to be: 'We are just overjoyed and cannot wait to meet our baby this spring! The fact that it happened in Israel just makes it that much more special for us. We have been through a lot, and we're just so excited for this next journey together! #babybrov'

'The first trimester wasn't easy for me, and he was and is an amazing support system.'

'We are just overjoyed and cannot wait to meet our baby this spring! The fact that it happened in Israel just makes it that much more special for us. We have been through a lot, and we're just so excited for this next journey together! #babybrov.'

Loren and Alexei met in Israel during her Birthright trip, when he joined the group as the paramedic.

The pair have been married four years and currently star on 90 Day Fiancé: Pillow Talk, which airs Sundays at 11 p.m. ET on TLC.
